title: Login Issue
description: Customer cannot log in with valid credentials.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Reset link expired immediately after receiving.

title: Payment Declined Error
description: Customer’s card is declined even though funds are available.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer’s billing address shows a different city. They updated it but it still displays the old one.

title: Refund Not Received
description: Refund was processed 10 days ago but not credited to the bank account.

title: App Crashes on Startup
description: Mobile app closes immediately after launch on iOS 17.

title: Shipping Delay
description: Package has been stuck in transit for 5 days with no updates.

title: Email Notifications Missing
description: Customer is not receiving order confirmation emails.

title: Wrong Item Delivered
description: Customer received a different product than ordered.

title: Subscription Not Renewing
description: Auto-renewal failed even though payment method is valid.

title: Slow Website Performance
description: Pages are taking 10+ seconds to load.

title: Coupon Code Not Applying
description: Discount code shows invalid during checkout.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer not receiving SMS verification code.

title: App Update Not Available
description: Customer cannot see the latest app version on Google Play.
